TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UNUserNotificationCenterDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DidReceiveNotificationResponse (this MonoTouch.UserNotifications.IUNUserNotificationCenterDelegate This, MonoTouch.UserNotifications.UNUserNotificationCenter center, MonoTouch.UserNotifications.UNNotificationResponse response, Action completionHandler);

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
The notification center that received the response.
An action that takes no arguments and returns no value.
Docs.summary: Called when the user selects an action from a notification from the app.
